title: Calories in 20 Piece Chicken McNuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 20 piece chicken mcnuggets, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, fat, carbs, and tweaks for sauces or prep.
assumptions: McDonald's-style Chicken McNuggets, breaded, fried in vegetable oil, standard size (~16g each), no dipping sauces included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, frying method, and added sauces. Check restaurant or packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: 20 Chicken McNuggets provide ~840 kcal and ~46 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 dipping sauce packet (barbecue, divided for 20 pieces)
Air-fried instead of deep-fried (less oil absorption)
With added 1 slice cheese per 5 nuggets

faqs.q: How many calories in a 10-piece chicken McNuggets?
faqs.a: About 420 kcal for 10 pieces, half of the 20-piece total.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 20 piece chicken McNuggets?
faqs.a: Roughly 46 g of protein from the breaded chicken.

faqs.q: Do chicken McNuggets have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1700 mg total for 20 pieces due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How do sauces affect calories in 20 piece chicken McNuggets?
faqs.a: One sauce packet adds ~50 kcal; 5 packets for 20 pieces add ~250 kcal.

faqs.q: Are these values for McDonald's Chicken McNuggets?
faqs.a: Based on standard McDonald's data; other brands may vary slightly.
